book.synopsis: In her senior year of high school, Betsy Ray is torn between Joe Willard, who has written her letters all summer, and Tony Markham, her longtime friend who now sees her in a more romantic light. Reissue.
book.dimensions: Height: 7.5 Inches, Length: 5.25 Inches, Weight: 0.49 Pounds, Width: 0.75 Inches
